extendedInfo.description: View full-detail, 3D textured models and animations from over 20 different formats.â¢ View, rotate, zoomâ¢ Full-screen modeâ¢ Material support with transparency and custom diffuse/specular/ambient lightingâ¢ Register as default viewer for supported model typesâ¢ Import from local storage, or stream from http/https/ftp sourcesâ¢ Preloaded with sample models (courtesy of Assimp)â¢ Supported model formats include:    â¢ FBX (ascii), 3DS, BLEND, DAE (Collada), PLY, STL, OBJ, SMD, X, LWO, LXO, LWS, XML, DXF, HMP, MD2, MD3, MD5, MDC, MDL(Quake), NFF, TER, AC3D, MS3D(Milkshape), IFC-STEP, ASEâ¢ Supported material texture formats include:    â¢ BMP, CUT, DDS, DOOM, HDR, GIF, JP2, JPEG, LBM, MDL, PAL, PBM, PCD, PCX, PGM, PIC, PNG, PPM, PSD, PSP, RAW, SGI, TGA and TIF(F)â¢ Pro-Only Features:    â¢ Skeletal animation playback from common formats, including BVH, .DAE, .MD5 and .X     â¢ Adjust render quality    â¢ Dark and light backgrounds    â¢ Basic model statistics    â¢ Wireframe rendering    â¢ Light intensity and direction control    â¢ On-screen viewing controls    â¢ Load/disable textures after model import    â¢ Normal (bump) mapping supportâ¢ Coming Soon:     â¢ Screen-space ambient occlusion    â¢ Faster anti-aliasing

reviews.title: Easy model, texture search, assignment
reviews.comment: Intuitive touch rotation controls...best I\'ve tried. Bought the Pro version after a couple of minutes with the lite version. I use Sketcher3D Pro to create objects or a group of objects, then load them in this app to use textures, change lighting, rotate, scale, etc...then screen capture for photos.
reviews.author: Dana McPhee

reviews.title: Good but irritating
reviews.comment: The model keeps spinning out of control there should be an option to stop it spinning by itself and the virtical axis needs to be locked because it tips on its side when I turn it no the existing options do not fix this, these 2 things make it very hard to control.
reviews.author: Paul Lake

reviews.title: Easily the best model viewer IMO
reviews.comment: Great model viewer and the pro features really are worth the small price asked only problem I have had however is that can\'t find how to enable normal mapping and choose my texture. Dukedev could you please let me know if there are material settings I need to allow me to choose the texture?
reviews.author: Rob Hine

reviews.title: excellent 3d viewer but... alphas?
reviews.comment: I love this app is easy and the quality is excellent but some of my models need alpha to look cool i tryed to edit textures in several formats... but i can\'t get transparency working... anyone knows how to make them work since transparency is listed on the features list
reviews.author: Francisco pi\303\261a

reviews.title: Exactly what people need.
reviews.comment: Yes 5 star for your work. Well worth $3. If you ever make a app like blender it would be a hit. But what your doing now is excellent.
reviews.author: Eric Prince

reviews.title: Too simple
reviews.comment: I look forward to assemble a combination of models and transparency support. Opps, I didn\'t mean that its missing somthing, just hope you\'d consider an upgraded version than can arrange, scale models because it is useful for stage or interior design. I\'m sure people will love to play/ compose montage with their photos too.
reviews.author: Philip Fong

reviews.title: Beautiful!
reviews.comment: Exactly simply the best of its kind. And just gets better and better with each update. I would very much love to see in a future update a list of basic  primitives that we can use to build models with? ;) Then this app would be just perfect.
reviews.author: Ruebin Dunson

reviews.title: iZer Studio
reviews.comment: EXcellent!! I love this app!!! Because of smooth and many type support.Can u make your app to open .max .c4d file? :)

reviews.title: Simply the Best
reviews.comment: I\'ll write what I\'ve wrote before; This is without a doubt the best 3D model viewer that has ever hit the Android market. I took one look at Duke Dev\'s YouTube preview, skipped straight to buying the pro version, and I haven\'t had a single issue displaying any of my models since. I mainly use this to show off the models that I\'ve extracted from popular games, but I will definitely be using this at University for my Computer Graphics study group sessions too.
reviews.author: Thomas Fischer

reviews.title: Very nice!
reviews.comment: This app is excellent, very smooth. It loads my high res models without problems. The developer responded quickly on a few problems i had. Highly recommended!
reviews.author: Stian Ervik Wahlv\303\245g

reviews.comment: Waste of money... it\'s even too crapy to be free...

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Had a great support from the developer. Amazing work!
reviews.author: danipikeno .

reviews.title: Most responsive stl or obj file viewer
reviews.comment: With large files (40mb+ scans) model manipulation is much more responsive and actually usable, vs the slideshow i got with the other viewers
reviews.author: Kevin Holmes

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Just to load the binary fbxes and it\'s perfect!
reviews.author: Matej Paulovi\304\215
